resources.string:
Welcome to the Sample Quiz!
Question 1: What is the capital of France? A) London B) Berlin C) Madrid D) Paris
Question 2: Who wrote the play "Romeo and Juliet"? A) Charles Dickens B) William Shakespeare C) Jane Austen D) F. Scott Fitzgerald
Question 3: What is the chemical symbol for water? A) H2O B) CO2 C) NaCl D) O2
Question 4: In which year did Christopher Columbus reach the Americas? A) 1492 B) 1776 C) 1812 D) 1865
Question 5: What is the largest planet in our solar system? A) Earth B) Mars C) Venus D) Jupiter
Good luck with your quiz! Welcome to the Sample Quiz!
